snippet: It doesn't exactly ring like "I am Spartacus" (and crucifixion will almost certainly not be involved), but Jeremy Grantham's identification with Occupy Wall Street is worth noting.
abstract: It doesn't exactly ring like "I am Spartacus" (and crucifixion will almost certainly not be involved), but Jeremy Grantham's identification with Occupy Wall Street is worth noting.

headline.main: A Plutocrat Takes On the Plutocracy
